lead_paragraph: A lot of the credit for being a miracle maker in the Cubs' climb to a long-awaited World Series has been heaped on team architect Theo Epstein, but Chicago's team president praised manager Joe Maddon.

headline.print_headline: Managers Win Measure of Credit for World Series Showdown
headline.main: Managers Win Measure of Credit for World Series Showdown
